contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "all" is an exaggeration to show how impossible it was to provide food for all the people of Israel. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hyperbole]])
contextId.glQuote: all the fish in the sea

contextId.occurrenceNote: The people exaggerate because they will hold Moses responsible if any of them die. Alternate translation: "to have us die" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hyperbole]])
This is an exaggeration to emphasize how many of them there were. Alternate translation: "They are extremely numerous" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hyperbole]])
contextId.glQuote: They cover the face of the earth
